channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0383|2024-08-28T19:35:46.841Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description:
User-controlled operations could have allowed Denial of Service in M-Files Server before 23.4.12528.1
due to uncontrolled memory consumption.

item.title: CVE-2023-3425|2024-08-28T18:29:48.168Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Out-of-bounds read issue in M-Files Server versions below 23.8.12892.6 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.2 LTS SR3 allows unauthenticated user to read restricted amount of bytes from memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-0382|2024-08-28T19:36:12.260Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description:
User-controlled operations could have allowed Denial of Service in M-Files Server before 23.4.12528.1
due to uncontrolled memory consumption.

item.title: CVE-2023-0384|2024-08-28T19:28:36.098Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description:
User-controlled operations could have allowed Denial of Service in M-Files Server before 23.4.12528.1
due to uncontrolled memory consumption for a scheduled job.

item.title: CVE-2023-6239|2024-08-28T08:17:32.251Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Under rare conditions, the effective permissions of an object might be incorrectly calculated if the object has a specific configuration of metadata-driven permissions in M-Files Server versions 23.9, 23.10, and 23.11 before 23.11.13168.7, potentially enabling unauthorized access to the object.

item.title: CVE-2022-4861|2024-08-28T20:05:34.948Z -- m-files -- m-files%20client
item.description: Incorrect implementation in authentication protocol in M-Files Client before 22.5.11356.0 allows high privileged user to get other users tokens to another resource.

item.title: CVE-2023-2480|2024-08-28T18:21:05.801Z -- m-files -- m-files%20client
item.description: Missing access permissions checks in M-Files Client before 23.5.12598.0 (excluding 23.2 SR2 and newer) allows elevation of privilege via UI extension applications

item.title: CVE-2023-3405|2024-08-28T18:21:55.335Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Unchecked parameter value in M-Files Server in versions before 23.6.12695.3 (excluding 23.2 SR2 and newer) allows anonymous user to cause denial of service

item.title: CVE-2023-6189|2024-08-28T08:17:57.402Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description:
Missing access permissions checks
in the M-Files server before 23.11.13156.0 allow attackers to perform data write and export
jobs using the M-Files API methods.

item.title: CVE-2022-4858|2024-08-28T20:02:15.797Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log Files in M-Files Server before 22.10.11846.0 could allow to obtain sensitive tokens from logs, if specific configurations were set.

item.title: CVE-2023-6117|2024-08-28T08:20:42.805Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description:
A possibility of unwanted server memory consumption was detected through the obsolete functionalities in the Rest API methods of the M-Files server
before 23.11.13156.0 which allows attackers to execute DoS attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-4270|2024-08-28T20:01:20.356Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Incorrect privilege assignment issue in M-Files Web in M-Files Web versions before 22.5.11436.1 could have changed permissions accidentally.

item.title: CVE-2022-4862|2024-08-28T20:06:02.609Z -- m-files -- m-files%20new%20web
item.description:
Rendering of HTML provided by another authenticated user is possible in browser on M-Files Web before 22.12.12140.3. This allows the content to steal user sensitive information.
This issue affects M-Files New Web: before 22.12.12140.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-3284|2024-08-28T20:00:07.310Z -- m-files -- m-files%20new%20web
item.description: Download key for a file in a vault was passed in an insecure way that could easily be logged in M-Files New Web in M-Files before 22.11.12011.0. This issue affects M-Files New Web: before 22.11.12011.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-2112|2024-08-28T19:27:53.050Z -- m-files -- m-files%20desktop
item.description: Desktop component service allows lateral movement between sessions in M-Files before 23.4.12455.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-0213|2024-08-28T19:37:22.593Z -- m-files -- m-files
item.description: Elevation of privilege issue in M-Files Installer versions before 22.6 on Windows allows user to gain SYSTEM privileges via DLL hijacking.

item.title: CVE-2023-2325|2024-08-28T20:06:58.799Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Stored XSS Vulnerability in M-Files Classic Web versions before 23.10 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.2 LTS SR4 and 23.8 LTS SR1allows attacker to execute script on users browser via stored HTML document.

item.title: CVE-2022-4264|2024-08-28T20:00:42.953Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Incorrect Privilege Assignment in M-Files Web (Classic) in M-Files before 22.8.11691.0 allows low privilege user to change some configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-5524|2024-08-28T18:32:12.041Z -- m-files -- web%20companion
item.description:
Insufficient blacklisting in M-Files Web Companion before release version 23.10 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.8 LTS SR1 allows
Remote Code Execution
via specific file types

item.title: CVE-2022-1606|2024-08-28T18:09:14.648Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Incorrect privilege assignment in M-Files Server versions before 22.3.11164.0 and before 22.3.11237.1 allows user to read unmanaged objects.

item.title: CVE-2023-5523|2024-08-28T18:31:19.837Z -- m-files -- web%20companion
item.description:
Execution of downloaded content flaw in M-Files Web Companion before release version 23.10 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.8 LTS SR1 allows
Remote Code Execution

item.title: CVE-2022-1911|2024-08-28T18:16:01.070Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Error in parser function in M-Files Server versions before 22.6.11534.1 and before 22.6.11505.0 allowed unauthenticated access to some information of the underlying operating system.

item.title: CVE-2023-3406|2024-08-28T18:29:05.426Z -- m-files -- m-files%20web
item.description: Path Traversal issue in M-Files Classic Web versions below 23.6.12695.3 and LTS Service Release Versions before 23.2 LTS SR3 allows authenticated user to read some restricted files on the web server
